scripts.install: (cd client && yarn) && (cd server && yarn) && (cd functional_tests && yarn)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 yarn start" "cd server && PORT=3001 yarn start"
scripts.test-client: (cd client; yarn start & ) && (cd client && CI=true yarn test)
scripts.test: yarn test-client && yarn test-server && yarn test-functional
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && yarn build" "cd server && yarn build"
